menu.compactspawners.name: CompactSpawners
menu.compactspawners.general.name: General
menu.compactspawners.general.maxmergedsp: Decides the amount of spawners, which are allowed in a spawner block.
menu.compactspawners.general.maxstoredex: Decides the amount of exp a spawner block should store.
menu.compactspawners.general.silkspawner: Decides whether the spawner should be mineable with silk touch enchantment or not.
menu.compactspawners.general.requiredpla: Decides in which range a player should stand nearby a spawner to spawn mobs.
menu.compactspawners.general.mobsperspaw: Decides how many mobs there should 'spawn' per period
menu.compactspawners.general.luck.descri: Defines with what value of luck an entity should be killed inside a spawner.
